subject: Please accept a FREE BOTTLE
body:
Are you or a 
loved one in PAIN?  
 
Research has proven that most of the pains 
in our bodies are caused by inflammation.  This 
includesarthritis and even heart disease.  There is a testyou can 
take to measure the inflammation you have,called C-Reactive Protein.  
Ask your doctor about it.  
 
If you or someone you care about has pain, 
please give an amazing new anti-inflammatory 
supplement 
called OMEGA XL a try.  I will be happy to give you a 

$49.95 bottle for FREE -- a full month's supply -- pay 
only $6.95 for postage.  Please go to my site 
http://www.UltimatePainRelief.com and fill out the form, then you'll get taken to the order 
page.Once you pay the $6.95 postage, you will receiveyour own site and 
can start giving away free bottlesto your friends immediately.  After 
you join thebusiness, I'll send you an email teaching you *exactly*how 
you can maximize the profits you make from thisproduct.  I'll teach you 
*exactly* where and how to advertise to get customers -- it's so easy!  
And once 
someone starts buying, they will buy 
forever --
because this product really relieves 
pain!  You will 
make money on each customer forever.  
(And since 
we're all getting older, there will be 
more and 
more customers all the time....)  

 

Get more information about this product 
here --http://www.HealthIsRightAroundTheCorner.comAnd while you're there, also click on the 
Opportunitytab on the top, to read about how you can make 
a
good living just by helping people and 
giving away 
FREE bottles of OMEGA XL to others who are 
in pain.
 
If you've been looking for a great home 
business thatwill really help people AND make you an excellentresidual 
income for the rest of your life, look no further.  This is it!  
But you do not have to do thebusiness in order to use the product -- try 
your freemonth's supply, and see how much better you feel.You can just 
buy it and use it to relieve your painwithout doing the business.  

 
Please order your free bottle NOW and get 
startedright away! See how it will change YOUR life.
 
Here is the call schedule if you'd like to 
learn more about OMEGA XL and hear some of the amazing testimonials in 
person...
 
512-879-2296PIN: HEALTH# (432584) 

 
Monday thru Thursday Product and 
Opportunity Call at 8pm EST and 
10pm EST Thursday at 10pm EST is our 
Doctor Call with 
Dr. Anello! 
 
Saturday Team Training 12pm EST 

 
Sunday Product and Opportunity Call 
10pm EST 
Looking forward to working with you 
--
 
Michelle
